page.title: 17Seaweed Fertilizer,Wiltshire
page.content: My name is Mark Edgcumbe,I live in Calne.I am writing about my father's interesting job.SEAMAC is where my father works,in Chippenham.He is the manager of the factory.Six other people work there too. They make fertilizer out of seaweed. It is most unusual.All the seaweed comes from Scotland,on big lorries.It goes into a heater.Then the hot seaweed goes into a press and the juice drips out into a tray. After that the mulch is put into bags and the juice is put into drums. It is sent off to farmers all over the British Isles and overseas. At the moment one bag costs about 15 pounds.
